com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.cache

Class CacheFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.cache.CacheFactory

  • public class CacheFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for creating UPA ValueAdd Cache package objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createPayloadCache

        public static PayloadCache createPayloadCache(PayloadCacheConfigOptions configOptions,
                                              CacheError error)
        Creates an instance of a payload cache container. This is a thread safe method.
        Parameters:
        configOptions - The options for configuring this cache container
        error - Error information populated if this function fails
        Returns:
        The payload cache instance
        See Also:
        PayloadCache, PayloadCacheConfigOptions, CacheError

      • createPayloadEntry

        public static PayloadEntry createPayloadEntry(PayloadCache cacheInstance,
                                              CacheError error)
        Creates an instance of a payload entry. This is a thread safe method.
        Parameters:
        cacheInstance - The cache where this entry will be created
        error - Error information populated if the cache entry cannot be created
        Returns:
        The payload entry instance
        See Also:
        PayloadCache, PayloadEntry, CacheError

      • createPayloadCursor

        public static PayloadCursor createPayloadCursor()
        Creates an instance of a payload entry cursor. This is a thread safe method.
        Returns:
        The payload cursor
        See Also:
        PayloadCursor

      • createPayloadCacheConfig

        public static PayloadCacheConfigOptions createPayloadCacheConfig()
        Creates an instance of a payload cache configuration options. This is a thread safe method.
        Returns:
        The payload cache configuration option instance
        See Also:
        PayloadCacheConfigOptions

      • createCacheError

        public static CacheError createCacheError()
        Creates an instance of a cache error. This is a thread safe method.
        Returns:
        The cache error instance
        See Also:
